name: Twisted Charades!
description:
Get ready for the perfect game that fits into any context! Fits like Ice Breaker or on a get together with your friends, maybe for a cozy family evening. Pick up the app and use your best gestures to describe the word or phrase!

250 + TERMS AND WORDS
Twisted Charades contains 250+ expressions and words, difficult and easy and suitable for both children and adults. Regularly updated to make the game bigger and bigger and to give you new charades.

ADJUSTABLE TIMER
An adjustable timer that is easy to set up directly in the app.

SCOREKEEPER
A scorekeeper to help you select the best and the slightly less well in Twisted Charades!

The app fits both the twisted party or quiet family evening!
